titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives on support for Georgia.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives on support for Georgia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Europe, Eurasia, Energy and the Environment.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for Georgia's sovereignty and territorial integrity and does not recognize the independence of the Abkhazia and South Ossetia regions currently occupied by Russia.
